During the event, exhibitors for Scitech approached us to provide our ‘expert’ opinion on how zombies might spread across Australia. This evolved into a feature article for Particle [ 12], an online magazine producing news, stories and views. Ideas explored in the article included:
Is it possible to mathematically work out how fast a zombie apocalypse would spread across the world?
If they only eat brains, would they eventually run out of food?
As an educated guess, where would it likely start? and being so isolated, does Perth/WA have an advantage?
